Job Description: Duties and responsibilities    Requirement Analysis, Design, Development and Enhancement of IP and Security Protocols, Services and associated subsystems in a feature rich networking device/VNF,   Should work closely with all of R&D and Product Management to jointly deliver high quality products and solutions.   Evaluation of different architectural and implementation approaches.    Skills and profile    Prior experience in requirement analysis, design and implementation of IPv4 and IPv6 Services like AAA, RADIUS, TACACS, Syslog, Telnet, SSH, FTP, DHCP, DNS, NTP/SNTP and other networking device infrastructure control plane IP
Functional Area: IT Software - Embedded, EDA, VLSI, ASIC, Chip Design,
